column2: Mobile App QA : We are looking for a skilled Quality Engineer to join our QA team. As a quality engineer, you will be responsible for evaluating software functions and designing test protocols to ensure that products work as intended. You will also be responsible for completing all testing procedures, suggesting performance changes, and preparing performance reports for the development managers. Basic Qualifications 1. Engineering in Computer Science or equivalent. 2. Knowledge of programming languages (Java, C, Javascript) 3. Knowledge of Appium or any other automation tool  4. Knowledge of any automation framework (TestNG, Selenium) 5. Knowledge of Manual Testing and SQL 6. Exposure/knowledge of Jenkins/Teamcity & Continuous Integration, Gradle/Maven & GitHub 7. Good problem-solving ability, analytical and communication skills 8. Excellent time-management skills and commitment to meet deadlines. Responsibilities 1. Design test plans, procedures, scenarios, and scripts to accurately assess new products or software updates according to product requirements and company policies. 2. Develop testing protocol for various aspects, such as usability, database impact, error and bug finding, regression testing, and implementation scenarios. 3. Identify, analyze and create detailed records of problems that appear during testing, such as software defects, bugs, functionality issues, and output errors, and work directly with software developers to find solutions and develop retesting procedures. 4. Track problems, resolutions, and bug fixes throughout testing and create a comprehensive database of defects and successful mitigation techniques. 5. Create detailed, step-by-step documentation of test procedures for each phase or project as needed to ensure replicability, compliance with standards, and growth of the company knowledge base. 6. Communicate clearly and effectively with test personnel, users, developers, and clients to facilitate quick resolution of problems and accurate documentation of successes. 7. Provide frequent feedback to developers, including recommendations for improvements, evaluation of problems, potential solutions, and discussion of further test requirements. 8. Design and implement automated testing tools when possible, and update tools as needed to ensure currency and accuracy.
column11: Mobile Automation Testing, Appium, Mobile Application Testing

column1: Lead QA Engineer | Mobile Applications & Blockchain
column2: Sr. / Lead QA Engineer - Mobile Applications, Web Services, and Blockchain Experience:  10+ years Salary :  INR 2,32,558 / month Expected Notice Period : 2 to 4 Weeks Shift : 10:00AM to 6:00PM IST Opportunity Type:  Hybrid (Bengaluru) Placement Type:  Permanent (*Note: This is a requirement for one of Uplers' clients) What do you need for this opportunity? Primary Skills : Manual Testing, Team Collaboration, Mobile Testing Framework, Vendor Management, Performance Optimization, AWS Device Farm, Quality Assurance, Blockchain Testing, Selenium, Ci/Cd Pipelines,  Assessment:  Role based AI Screening covering Communication and Technical Skills Our Hiring Partner is Looking for: Sr. / Lead QA Engineer - Mobile Applications, Web Services, and Blockchain who is passionate about their work, eager to learn and grow, and who is committed to delivering exceptional results. If you are a team player, with a positive attitude and a desire to make a difference, then we want to hear from you. Roles & Responsibilities Mode of Work:  Hybrid, Bangalore (The Talent shall require to visit office for meetings, frequency to be discussed with the client) Level & Grade:  Senior/Lead Technology Division/Dept.:  Product Innovation Reports to:  Head of Product Innovation / Head of IT Operations Job Purpose: As a Senior/Lead Quality Assurance (QA) Engineer specializing in mobile applications, web services, and blockchain technologies, you will be instrumental in ensuring the quality, reliability, and security of our software products. Your role will involve leading the QA efforts, collaborating closely with development teams, and implementing comprehensive testing strategies across multiple platforms. You will play a critical role in shaping the user experience and maintaining the integrity of our digital solutions. Key Responsibilities: Leadership and Team Management: Lead and mentor a team of QA engineers, fostering a culture of excellence and innovation in both manual and automation testing practices. Test Strategy Development: Develop and implement comprehensive test strategies for mobile applications, web services, and blockchain solutions, encompassing both manual and automated testing approaches. Manual Testing: Conduct thorough manual testing of software applications, ensuring functionality, usability, and compatibility across various devices, browsers, and platforms. Automation Testing: Drive automation efforts for testing by designing, developing, and maintaining automated test suites using industry-standard tools and frameworks, such as Selenium, Appium, or Cypress. Test Planning and Execution: Plan and execute manual and automated test cases, scenarios, and scripts to achieve maximum test coverage and uncover potential defects. Cross-functional Collaboration: Collaborate closely with development teams, product managers, and stakeholders to ensure alignment of manual and automated testing activities with project requirements and timelines. Quality Assurance Standards: Define and enforce quality assurance standards and best practices for both manual and automated testing, ensuring consistency and reliability in testing processes. Defect Management: Identify, document, and track defects found during manual and automated testing, working closely with development teams to facilitate timely resolution and maintain product quality. Performance Optimization: Proactively identify performance bottlenecks through manual and automated testing, collaborating with development teams to optimize software performance and enhance user experience. Continuous Improvement: Drive continuous improvement initiatives within the QA team, incorporating feedback, lessons learned, and emerging technologies to enhance both manual and automated testing processes and methodologies. Engagement Type: Direct-hire on the DigiYatra payroll Client / Talent Agreement - Full-time Permanent position The final salary CTC will be offered by the client based on the Interview performance, Current CTC and Technical Experience The Ideal Candidate: Ready to play an Independent contributor role Ready to build strategy, roadmap and work with Tier I Vendors and coordinate on the project solutions and problem statements Jump In to solve the problems when the deadlines are about to miss Strong Project Management and Hands-on Expertise on Cloud Implementation The talents from Product Companies, B2B SaaS are most preferred for this role Project Requirements: 10 - 12 years of experience in quality assurance, with a strong background in both manual and automation testing methodologies. Proficiency in designing, developing, and executing manual test cases and scenarios to verify software functionality, usability, and performance. Extensive experience in implementing and maintaining automated test suites using industry-standard tools and frameworks, with a focus on enhancing test coverage and efficiency. Strong understanding of test automation principles and best practices, including test script design, data-driven testing, and continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines. Familiarity with mobile testing frameworks and tools, such as XCTest, Espresso, or XCUITest, for automating mobile application testing on iOS and Android platforms. Knowledge of web services testing tools, such as Postman or SoapUI, for validating API functionality, performance, and security. Experience with version control systems, such as Git, for managing test automation codebase and collaborating with development teams. Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written, with the ability to effectively convey technical concepts and findings to cross-functional teams and stakeholders. Key differentiating advantages: Experience in implementing hybrid testing approaches, combining manual and automated testing techniques to maximize test coverage and efficiency. Knowledge and experience in testing blockchain applications, including smart contracts auditing and consensus mechanism validation. Proficiency in utilizing machine learning algorithms for test data generation, anomaly detection, or predictive analytics in software testing. Familiarity with cloud-based testing platforms and services, such as AWS Device Farm or Sauce Labs, for executing automated tests across various devices and environments. Certification in software testing, such as ISTQB Certified Tester or Agile Testing Certification, demonstrating a commitment to professional development and industry best practices. Educational Requirements: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Information Technology, or related field. Behavioural Competencies: Good verbal and written communication skills. Experience in leading teams technically. Ability to communicate effectively with remote teams. Strong analytical, logical skills, and team-leading skills. How to apply for this opportunity? Register or login on our portal & fill out the application Clear the given AI Screening (30 min) and Click on Apply to get shortlisted Our team of talent matchmakers will matchmake you with the client Crack a quick interview with our client Land your global dream job and get your exciting career started! About our Hiring Partner: Digi Yatra Foundation is a non-profit organization dedicated to revolutionising air travel in India through digital solutions. Our mission is to enhance the efficiency, safety, and enjoyment of air travel by leveraging the latest technologies. We collaborate closely with government agencies, airlines, airports, and technology partners to develop solutions for passenger identification, security screening, boarding, and more. About Uplers: Our goal is to make hiring reliable, simple, and fast. Our role will be to help all our talents find and apply for relevant opportunities and progress in their career. We will support any grievances or challenges you may face during the engagement. You will also be assigned to a dedicated Talent Success Coach during the engagement.  ( Note:  There are many more opportunities apart from this on the portal. Depending on the assessments you clear, you can apply for them as well).  So, if you are ready for a new challenge, a great work environment, and an opportunity to take your career to the next level, don't hesitate to apply today. We are waiting for you!

Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field. 4+ years of experience in automation testing, with a focus on mobile applications. Strong expertise in using the Appium framework for testing SAP mobile apps. Proficiency in scripting languages such as Java, Python, or Ruby for test automation. Excellent communication skills and ability to work collaboratively in a team environment. Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.

column2: Job Summary This individual contributor is responsible for guiding and influencing the development of a formal Global Quality Services Framework and for supporting the development of software quality assurance test strategies.       Essential Responsibilities Completes work assignments and supports business-specific projects by applying expertise in subject area; supporting the development of work plans to meet business priorities and deadlines; ensuring team follows all procedures and policies; coordinating and assigning resources to accomplish priorities and deadlines; collaborating cross-functionally to make effective business decisions; solving complex problems; escalating high priority issues or risks, as appropriate; and recognizing and capitalizing on improvement opportunities. Practices self-development and promotes learning in others by proactively providing information, resources, advice, and expertise with co-workers and customers; building relationships with cross-functional stakeholders; influencing others through technical explanations and examples; adapting to competing demands and new responsibilities; listening and responding to, seeking, and addressing performance feedback; providing feedback to others and managers; creating and executing plans to capitalize on strengths and develop weaknesses; supporting team collaboration; and adapting to and learning from change, difficulties, and feedback. Identifies, defines, and mitigates complex issues, dependencies, and risks related to testing. Determines testing scope and approach, and collaborates with cross-functional IT and business stakeholders to review and approve the overall testing approach. Ensures test plans and timelines are aligned with project/program milestones. Leads and assists in the development of the quality assurance (QA) test project strategies, methodologies, and standard processes for moderately to highly complex IT initiatives across multiple QA domains by analysing business and technology requirements to ensure testability and traceability. Reviews and validates testable business processes, test data, and test environment requirements. Defines and ensures adherence with entry and exit criteria according to testing standards. Manages the development of test scenarios and execution of test cases across all testing phases (e.g., SIT, Performance, UAT, Automation, Production, Validation). Generates scheduled reports (e.g., test execution, defects, ad hoc reports) and provides daily test execution metrics to IT teams and management, as appropriate. Collaborates with cross-functional IT teams to gain buy-in and approval of test plans, and tracks quality metrics across testing phases (e.g., SIT, Performance, UAT, Automation, Production, Validation). Develops quality assurance (QA) project plans, with guidance from senior team members as appropriate, for moderately to highly complex projects by participating in the identification of project scope, work plans, schedules, milestones, critical paths, and ensuring proper staffing. Ensures quality metrics are tracked across testing phases (e.g., SIT, Performance, UAT, Automation, Production, Validation). Test automation skills are a must have, programming in Java, Karate, Selenium or any automation (API & UI) scripting languages required Debug failures using Splunk or Dyna trace is a plus. Ability to debug defects by looking at logs and traces is a must.  Work closely with development teams in understanding technical requirements and using these requirements come up with test cases and test strategies Work in an Agile and a fast paced environment

column2: Job Overview:   We are looking for a seasoned Senior Mobile Functional Tester with a strong background in testing enterprise web applications from inception to completion. The ideal candidate will possess expertise in Core Java, Selenium WebDriver, and Appium automation for iOS and Android native applications. This role requires proficiency in IntelliJ IDE, coupled with comprehensive manual and automation testing skills. Key Responsibilities: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand project requirements and develop detailed test plans and strategies. Design, develop, and execute automated test scripts using Selenium WebDriver and Appium to ensure the quality and reliability of mobile applications on iOS and Android platforms. Conduct manual testing as needed to validate functionality, identify defects, and ensure a seamless user experience. Perform regression testing to verify software updates and enhancements, maintaining backward compatibility across multiple devices and platforms. Perform exploratory testing to uncover hidden defects and usability issues. Investigate and troubleshoot reported issues, documenting defects and providing detailed reports to stakeholders. Continuously evaluate and improve testing processes, tools, and methodologies to enhance efficiency and effectiveness. Mentor junior team members, providing guidance on testing best practices and technical skills development.   Requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field. Proven experience as a Senior Mobile Functional Tester, with a minimum of [6+] years in enterprise web application testing and mobile application testing. Proficiency in Core Java and hands-on experience with Selenium WebDriver for web application testing. Mastery of Selenium WebDriver with Java for automating web application testing, including experience with Page Object Model (POM), data-driven testing, and cross-browser testing. Extensive experience with Appium automation framework for testing native iOS and Android applications, including knowledge of Appium architecture, desired capabilities configuration, and locator strategies. Conduct thorough viewport testing to ensure the website or web application is responsive, visually appealing, and functionally correct across various devices and screen sizes, using tools such as Chrome DevTools, Responsive Design Checker, or BrowserStack. Proficiency in testing mobile applications on both Android and iOS platforms Familiarity with IntelliJ IDE and other development environments. Experience working in an agile/scrum environment. Familiarity with bug tracking tools like JIRA, Bugzilla, or similar. Solid understanding of manual and automation testing concepts, methodologies, and best practices. Proficient with key testing types (functional, regression, smoke, acceptance). Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to identify and resolve complex issues. Strong communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to effectively interact with stakeholders at all levels.   Preferred Skills: Certification in software testing (e.g., ISTQB) is desirable. Experience with mobile testing frameworks and tools (e.g., XCTest, Espresso) is a plus. Knowledge of front-end development technologies (e.g., HTML, CSS, JavaScript) is beneficial. Knowledge of API testing using tools like Postman. Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git) and continuous integration tools (e.g., Jenkins). Basic scripting or programming skills (e.g., Python, Java) for test automation. Stay updated with the latest mobile testing tools, technologies, and best practices.

The tech team is the driving force of the world-class fintech mobile app. This product will be used by millions of people around the world. We are looking for the QA who is passionate about quality and testing. Sounds good? Let's talk  Responsibilities Planning and executing actions required to ensure the best possible quality of the BABB products; iOS and Android mobile applications, and an admin panel Designing test scenarios for new and existing features for the business processes Reviewing test results, creating bug reports Full ownership and accountability of planning, managing and executing testing activities Control and flexibility on testing team / size / composition / work location A GOOD candidate have Strong knowledge of QA methodologies, tools, and processes Solid knowledge of Selenium / TestNG / Java to support automation across all platforms  Web, Mobile & APIs Basic understanding of SQL queries Open-minded and a proactive attitude Strong problem-solving and analytical skills A PERFECT candidate also Writes integration tests in xUnit .NET Has extensive experience in mobile app testing automation Has experience in Azure DevOps Experience with REST API testing using Postman (or other tool) Experience using Git Experience with CI/CD pipeline configuration Testing Requirements Functional manual testing of the mobile applications for new feature releases, and regression testing, until good automation test coverage is achieved. Manual and automation can go in parallel. Immediate Short Term Goals for the role (1-3 Months) Conduct a thorough test design of the product to identify test cases for manual testing and test automation. Begin with manual functional testing of the BABB mobile applications to cover critical scenarios and user journeys. Test automation suite developmen to fthe current product backlog ensuring 90%+ coverage across transactional flows including sign-up, login, profile, transaction history, conversions, and settings. Mid to Long Term Goals for the role (Month 4 to 12) Manual functional testing of the mobile applications for new feature releases, ensuring near to Zero P0 Issues leakage into production. Automated test suites integrated with CI/CD, for continuous testing and Regression of the Product.  Manual testing to plug the gaps in test automation coverage as required. Continuous test automation development (n+1sprint) and maintenance, to ensure effective test coverage and continuous testing as a practice. Preferred candidate profile Quick learner with an ambitious and results-oriented mindset. Ability to work as part of a team in a fast-paced environment. Outstanding communication and organisational abilities. Fluent English. Nice to have Experience in financial services and startup environments. GitHub account with cool projects. Proficiency in Blockchain, Web3 and Crypto. Perks and benefits Up to 2 days of remote work. Performance based bonuses. Our tech stack: iOS: Swift 5, Xcode 13.2.1. Android: Android SDK, Kotlin and Java. Backend: .NET 7/8, REST API, Azure Functions, PostgreSQL, AngularJS, xUnit. PowerShell Infrastructure as a code: Bicep, Azure Web Apps, Azure Functions, Azure Key Vault, Azure Service Bus, Application Insights, Log Analytics Workspaces. CI/CD: Azure DevOps pipeline as code (YAML)

column2: Responsible for managing a Software Engineering team including defining team goals, leading the design and architecture process, overseeing the day-to-day tasks of the team members, and directly managing their work. The specific duties and responsibilities include the following: Directly managing a team of professionals responsible for the implementation of Agile-based development practices to design, architect, develop, test, and maintain a wide range of mobile and responsive UI applications and functionalities with industry leading engineering and design quality standards.  Collaborating with Product Managers and Architects to ensure proper implementation of product requirement strategies and roadmaps.  Managing and leading the design and development of end-to-end solutions for customer driven mobile and responsive UI applications/functionality.  Managing and leading the development of an automated test framework for mobile and UI applications including device-based testing.  Managing and leading the research of newer tools and mobile app development platforms which improve the teams efficiency and save cost for the company by reducing the time to go live. Managing and leading the effort towards scaling frontend development so that many teams can work simultaneously on a large and complex cloud-based products. Managing and ensuring the successful delivery of large-sized and complex cloud-based projects as defined by the content, quality, performance, and time to arket.  Managing the development of a release plan for projects (within programs), proactively addressing deviations from the plan in collaboration with the senior leadership team.  Monitoring the development and quality of UI and mobile applications by following the quality standards set by UKG global quality organization and recommending improvements to the same based on new and leading industry trends.  Participating in technical discussions and reviewing changes to application and automation test code changes to ensure that software coding standards are being followed by team members as prescribed by UKG quality organization and industry best practices. Participating in defect and root cause analysis for defects and customer reported issues which cause service break downs or disruptions to UKG software usage. Ensuring good customer experience with UKG products by actively monitoring site reliability metrics, defect rate, production monitoring and working with various stakeholders in customer facing roles like sales and support organizations at UKG.  Setting, communicating, and monitoring performance and development goals and achievements of individual team members on an on-going basis.  Working with Engineering Leadership at UKG to ensure a high level of motivation and engagement within the team.  Working with Engineering Leadership at UKG to come up standard metrics to measure and improve the engineering team efficiency and reducing the cognitive load on team members. Collaborating with the various Delivery managers, Program Managers, Product Managers and Architects to communicate status of projects including risks, issues and constraints in the context of business value and impact.  Qualifications Position requires a Bachelors degree or an equivalent foreign degree in Electronics and Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Computer Science or a closely related field and 3 years of experience as a Software Engineer.  Must also have had 3 years of experience which can have been gained concurrently with the primary experience requirement above) working with the following: Design and development of mobile applications on mobile and tablet platforms for iOS and Android and hybrid app technologies including Cordova and PhoneGap including any REST services required to deliver such applications. Development of UI applications using JavaScript and native mobile applications SDKs including Angular, React, iOS 14 and above and Android 11 and above. Automated test frameworks Appium, selenium, XCUITest, Android UIAutomator, REST Assured, JUnit Design and development of applications which leverage Authentication protocols including SAML, OAUTH 2.0 and Open ID Connect with PKCE and various data encryption technologies.  Design and development of Cloud based CI/CD pipelines based on XCode Cloud, Circle CI or Google Cloud Build and of Cloud-based software using Google Cloud Platform, Firebase, Docker, Kubernetes Cloud database and cloud storage.
column11: software engineering, frontend development, selenium, mobile applications, electrical engineering, sales support
